data.title: Achieve Your Degree Program
data.text:
Ivy Tech Bloomington has partnerships with the following local companies for the Achieve Your Degree program. If you work for one of these companies, contact your HR department to learn more.

Ivy Tech Bloomington | Office of Admissions

812-330-6013 | bl-info@ivytech.edu

If you're an employer interested in creating an Achieve Your Degree partnership with Ivy Tech to help your employees skill up through tuition assistance, contact:

Adam Gross | Vice Chancellor,  Career Link

Ivy Tech Terre Haute/Greencastle has partnerships with the following local companies for the Achieve Your Degree program. If you work for one of these companies, contact your HR department to learn more. When you're ready to apply to the program, click on the "Apply Now" link next to your employer.

State of Indiana Government Employee Achieve Your Degree Partnership

In partnership with the State of Indiana, Ivy Tech is offering state employees an affordable education with no upfront costs. The Achieve Your Degree (AYD) program offers the flexibility to pursue educational opportunities in more than 70 degree programs, more than 40 of which are offered at the Terre Haute campus. The Achieve Your Degree partnership with the state allows tuition assistance of up to $5,250 per academic year to eligible employees. Students can earn an associate degree, short-term certificate, or workforce certification in numerous fields. Contact your agency's HR Director to learn more or visit the webpage.

Apply Now

If you're a student interested in earning your credential at Ivy Tech through your employer's Achieve Your Degree partnership, contact:

Kim Grayless | 812-298-2285 | kgrayless2@ivytech.edu

If you're a company interested in creating an Achieve Your Degree partnership with Ivy Tech to help your employees skill up through tuition assistance, contact:

Brooks David Weszely | 812-298-2304 | bweszely@ivytech.edu
